Posts.EditableText:
Hello All,

I have just downloaded Quest and like to delve straight into things. I have seen a few tutorials but I prefer to learn by example and looking at other peoples code.

Is there anywhere that I can download other peoples quest games to load into the editor? 

Kind regards
Phil.

Posts.EditableText: I think quest games are protected, as it is there work. You'll have to ask them to give you their game~source code. We do have public library files, and any code within the posts~threads of this discussion forum here, which you can look at and use. viewforum.php?f=18 hmm, wiki is down atm, maybe it's getting repaired~updated~cleaned, lol.
